meta_infos.name: Pedro Henrique's portfolio
meta_infos.title: Pedro Henrique | Fullstack developer | Frontend | Backend
meta_infos.desc: I'm a Fullstack, backend and frontend Developer. Here you can find my projects, resume and contact information. Enjoy! :)

presentation.title:
Hello, my
name's Pedro Henrique.
I'm a fullstack
developer.

about_me.title: About me

paragraphs.0: I'm a junior Fullstack programmer with experience in Typescript, React, React Native, Expo, NextJs, Postgres, Redis, Express and other technologies. I constantly seek to improve my skills to face challenges in innovative projects. I'm a Computer Science student at UFG.
paragraphs.1: I am looking for opportunities that allow me to apply these skills in a practical way, contributing effectively to collaborative teams. I am excited to participate in the development of exciting projects and contribute to effective solutions.
paragraphs.2: In addition to my professional interest, I enjoy music, games and reading, which contribute to my creative approach to problem solving.

skills_list: Mobile development (React Native, Firebase and Expo)

my_projects.title: Featured Projects
my_projects.subtitle: I am responsible for the integral development of all projects, from design to code implementation. Although these projects are personal, I am actively searching opportunities to be involved in professional work. To access my projects, I invite you to visit my full profile on <link>Github</link>.

portfolio.name: Portfolio
portfolio.description: I present my new portfolio, marked by modernity and innovation. With the addition of a personal blog and a countdown to my birthday, accompanied by an exclusive congratulatory wall, this project stands out as a significant milestone in my professional journey.

saturn_chat.name: Saturn Chat
saturn_chat.description: This ongoing project is my most significant initiative to date. A messaging app for mobile devices, simplifying WhatsApp and Discord features in a more intuitive way. It stands out for its advanced system of invitations, roles system, sending files and voice messages.

saturn_chat_api.name: Saturn Chat API
saturn_chat_api.description: This API is the operational basis of Saturn Chat. It uses Express, the PostgresSQL database (accessed via TypeORM) and stands out for its advanced websockets system. This system facilitates real-time transmission of events between the application and the API, optimized with Redis for caching.

green_force.name: Green Force
green_force.description: A website created with the purpose of promoting afforestation as a measure to mitigate global warming, this represents one of the first projects I developed. It constitutes a significant showcase of my transition to the position of Fullstack developer.

soundify.name: Soundify
soundify.description: A mobile music app designed to enhance playback of locally stored tracks. Offering features such as background playback, a dynamic player with automatic color selection for the layout, and an automatic song listing functionality on the device.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: I am available to discuss additional information, job opportunities and freelance projects. Please contact me for more detailed conversation.

call_to_blog.title: Hey, visit my blog!
call_to_blog.subtitle: Read my tech posts, daily development, details of my projects and more. Every week have new posts!
